flawed_nl_solution:
Her friend will pay $5 x 7 = $<<5*7=35>>35 after 7 days.
Her brother will pay $8 x 7 = $<<8*7=56>>56 after 7 days.
Her cousin will pay $4 x 7 = $<<4*7=82>>82 after 7 days.
Therefore, she will be able to collect $35 + $56 + $82 = $<<35+56+82=173>>173 after 7 days.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 82. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
